name: CarbonCreditRakeback
description: A Carbon Credit Token Rakeback Implementation. In order to work with permissioned tokens, this contract needs to be added to the respective permission list.

parameterDecorators.name: account
parameterDecorators.description: - The account that triggered the swap.

parameterDecorators.name: sourceBundleAddress
parameterDecorators.description: - the source bundle address.

parameterDecorators.name: targetBundleAddress
parameterDecorators.description: - the target bundle address.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenAddress
parameterDecorators.description: - the address of the token that was swapped.

parameterDecorators.name: swapAmount
parameterDecorators.description: - the amount swapped in terms of source bundle.

parameterDecorators.name: receivedAmount
parameterDecorators.description: - the amount received after fees in terms of target bundle.

eventDecorators.name: FeeDivisorUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted whenever a fee divisor is updated for a token.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: - The token with a new fee divisor.

parameterDecorators.name: feeDivisor
parameterDecorators.description: - The new fee divisor; the actual fee is the reciprocal.

parameterDecorators.name: account
parameterDecorators.description: - The account that triggered the offset.

parameterDecorators.name: bundleAddress
parameterDecorators.description: - the bundle address.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenAddress
parameterDecorators.description: - the address of the token that is to be offsetted.

parameterDecorators.name: initialAmount
parameterDecorators.description: - the amount to offset in terms of source bundle.

parameterDecorators.name: offsettedAmount
parameterDecorators.description: - the amount offsetted after fees in terms of the token.

eventDecorators.name: RakebackUnbundle
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone unbundles tokens from the bundle using the rakeback contract.

parameterDecorators.name: account
parameterDecorators.description: - The token recipient.

parameterDecorators.name: bundleAddress
parameterDecorators.description: - The bundle from which the token was unbundled.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenAddress
parameterDecorators.description: - The address of the vanilla underlying.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: - The amount sent to unbundle.

parameterDecorators.name: receivedAmount
parameterDecorators.description: - The amount after fees (these may change in the rakeback and are therefore explicit).

parameterDecorators.name: tokens_
parameterDecorators.description: - Array of CarbonCreditTokens.

parameterDecorators.name: tokens_
parameterDecorators.description: - Array of CarbonCreditTokens.

parameterDecorators.name: feeDivisor_
parameterDecorators.description: - Array of feeDivisors.

functionDecorators.name: bundle
functionDecorators.description: The bundle token associated with this rakeback.

functionDecorators.name: feeDivisor
functionDecorators.description: The fee divisor of a token. This uses the bundles default as a fallback if not specified, so it'll always work.

functionDecorators.name: hasTokenWithFeeDivisor
functionDecorators.description: Checks if a token has a fee divisor specified in this contract.

parameterDecorators.name: token_
parameterDecorators.description: - A carbon credit token.

returnDecorators.description: Whether we have a token fee divisor or not.

parameterDecorators.name: bundle_
parameterDecorators.description: - The bundle that this rakeback contract controls.

parameterDecorators.name: owner_
parameterDecorators.description: - The owner of this rakeback contract.

parameterDecorators.name: token_
parameterDecorators.description: - The GCO2 token to offset.

parameterDecorators.name: amount_
parameterDecorators.description: - The amount of tokens to offset.

returnDecorators.description: The amount of offsetted tokens after fee.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: swapBundle
functionDecorators.description: Swaps a given GCO2 token between bundles.

parameterDecorators.name: targetBundle_
parameterDecorators.description: - The bundle where the GCO2 token should be bundled into.

parameterDecorators.name: token_
parameterDecorators.description: - The GCO2 token to swap.

parameterDecorators.name: amount_
parameterDecorators.description: - The amount of tokens to swap.

returnDecorators.description: The amount of tokens arriving in the bundle (after fee).

functionDecorators.name: tokenWithFeeDivisorAtIndex
functionDecorators.description: A token with a fee divisor. The ordering may change upon adding / removing.

parameterDecorators.name: index_
parameterDecorators.description: - The index position taken from tokenCount().

returnDecorators.description: Address of the token at the index.

functionDecorators.name: tokenWithFeeDivisorCount
functionDecorators.description: Number of tokens that have a fee override.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: unbundle
functionDecorators.description: Unbundle the given token for the given amount. The sender needs to have given approval for the amount for the bundle.

parameterDecorators.name: token_
parameterDecorators.description: - The token the sender wishes to unbundle.

parameterDecorators.name: amount_
parameterDecorators.description: - The amount the sender wishes to unbundle.

returnDecorators.description: The amount after fees that the user receives.
